mapper.select: select r.* from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id = r.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct m.* from sys_user_role ur left join sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
select su.*, sur.role_id, sr.role_name from sys_user su join sys_user_role sur on su.user_id = sur.user_id join sys_role sr on sur.role_id = sr.role_id where su.user_id = #{userId}
